name: Bucket Bag
description:
Bucket Bag (Two Sides)

Product Details:

  • Measures 11"L x 4.5"W x 8"H inches
  • Exterior: 100% genuine leather
  • Interior: 100% nylon in dark color
  • Double handles measure 12" long
  • One interior cell phone pocket and two flat pockets
  • Zipper top closure

name: Classic Handbag
description:
Classic Handbag (Two Sides)

Photo is transferred onto polyester fabric with the dye sublimation process, so it won't fade, crack or peel. The body of the handbag is black. Zippered interior features both cell phone and privacy pocket.

Product Details:

  • Measures 8.5"L x 3.5"W x 6"H inches
  • 100% genuine leather (black color)
  • Double handles approximately 9" inches long
  • Zipper top closure
  • It is two sides photo bag design

name: Shoulder Sling Bag
description:
Shoulder Sling Bag

Light and practical shoulder bag. Whether for casual use during weekends or for work, this bag has many sub-compartments and is designed to house A4-sized files for convenient purposes.

Product Details:

  • Made from durable polyester fabric
  • Genuine leather outer layer for added protection
  • Single zippered top closure
  • Nylon interior
  • 2 internal pockets
  • Zippered hidden compartment
  • Zippered rear pocket
  • Image imprinted using dye sublimation process to ensure everlasting effect
  • Adjustable leather shoulder strap (28" min. – 50" max.)
  • Dimensions: 10.25"(w) x 12"(h) x 2.5"(d)

name: Canvas 16" x 12" (Stretched)
description:
Canvas 16" x 12" (Stretched)

Photos will be printed on high-quality canvas fabric, and carefully hand stretched over a strong anti-warping stretcher (wooden frame) which will preserve its lifetime. Please note this is a non-waterproof canvas.

Product Details:

  • The canvas measures 16"(L) x 12"(W) x 1/2" (H) inches
  • Top quality heavy weight cotton canvas
  • You can hang the stretched canvas on the wall directly, no mounting or framing is required
  • Wall mount included
